parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when registration is successful

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Time stamp for UTC time, using ts.server.com permission to check. (unit is milliseconds and supports 9 digits)

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Used to verify each API call

parameters.name: merchant_id
parameters.description: Merchant unique identifier for a merchant. Required for all authenticated requests

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api.path, timestamp, access_token and secret. Signature calculated by ASCII ascending and connected by '&'

response_fields.name: page_no
response_fields.description: Specifies the page number of fetch when in pagination use. Default is 1. Please note: All page numbers start from 1, not 0 for this API

response_fields.name: page_size
response_fields.description: Page size for GET requests to specify a page of results to return
